title: WTB - American Beauty no frame back, common, fair to good
author: Jeff_cvc

posts.post_title: WTB - American Beauty no frame back, common, fair to good
posts.post_content: I think the title says it all.  I'm trying to do a back run, the AB no frame is last one I need that isn't the top 11 rare backs.  Not concerned about the front of the card, but would prefer a clean back.  Thanks!  You can also email me at [url]jrsfbunch@aol.com[/url]
